categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Valantya was a Human woman, who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War and was a famous holovid actress.

Valantya was employed by a holovid station and her works included fictional dramas and documentaries. However, in her spare time, she directed propaganda and new pieces for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. She also allowed the Alliance to convert her apartment into a safehouse.
Valantya was tall, with dark-colored hair. She had an outgoing personality and was perceptive and intelligent. She was also a competant actress and director.
